comment:
* Info class holding information for {@link Translator}s and used by
 * {@link TranslationManager#createOnDeviceTranslator(TranslationContext, Executor, Consumer)}.

variables.name: FLAG_LOW_LATENCY
variables.comment: * This context will perform translations in low latency mode.

variables.name: FLAG_TRANSLITERATION
variables.comment: * This context will enable the {@link Translator} to return transliteration results.

variables.name: FLAG_DEFINITIONS
variables.comment: * This context will enable the {@link Translator} to return dictionary definitions.

variables.name: mSourceSpec
variables.comment: * {@link TranslationSpec} describing the source data to be translated.

variables.name: mTargetSpec
variables.comment: * {@link TranslationSpec} describing the target translated data.

variables.name: mTranslationFlags
variables.comment: * Translation flags to be used by the {@link Translator}

variables.name: mActivityId
variables.comment:
* The identifier for the Activity which needs UI translation.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: private void parcelActivityId(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public ActivityId getActivityId()
methods.comment:
* Returns the identifier for the Activity which needs UI translation or {@code null}
     * if it is a non-UI translation request.
     *
     * NOTE: If the application receiving this ActivityId also provides a ContentCaptureService, it
     * can be used to associate a TranslationRequest with a particular ContentCaptureSession.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static String translationFlagToString(@TranslationFlag int value)
public TranslationSpec getSourceSpec()
methods.comment: * {@link TranslationSpec} describing the source data to be translated.

methods.name: public TranslationSpec getTargetSpec()
methods.comment: * {@link TranslationSpec} describing the target translated data.

methods.name: public int getTranslationFlags()
methods.comment: * Translation flags to be used by the {@link Translator}

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: private void parcelActivityId(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public static String translationFlagToString(@TranslationFlag int value)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
